perform

public org.apache.struts.action.ActionForward perform(org.apache.struts.action.ActionMapping mapping,
                                                      org.apache.struts.action.ActionForm form,
                                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)

This class creates a list of acceptable text files that can be used with a test.

The files vector in the user_bean is re-used and must be re-made later so that it can re-scan the users directory for the newly created test results file.

setContentTypeAndLocale

private void setContentTypeAndLocale(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest hs_request,
                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse hs_response)
